CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Sourced__c, 'Partner Team Attributed'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Oppty_Type__c, 'Reseller'), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Oppty_Type__c, 'Direct Partner Purchase'))), 'Yes', 'No')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Partner Sourced Direct Purchase or Reseller Opportunities.
CustomField.label: Partner Oppty
